item.title: The Flow of People
item.author: rszumski@gmail.com (Russell Szumski)
item.description: Tools: R Data Source: THE GLOBAL FLOW OF PEOPLE The data is the bilateral migration flows between and within regions for five-year periods, 1990 to 2010. There has been a lot of talk about immigration lately. President Donald Trump expressed frustration with people coming to the US from “shithole countries”. So lets take a look at the flow of people. First lets look at the countries with a recorded migration volume of more than 500,000 people in the total span of the time periods.
